isentropic module

class isentropic.isentropic.CompressibleFlow(M=None, u=None, a=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None, gamma=1.4, gas='Air', R=287)

Bases: object

CompressibleFlow class

This class solves for all possible thermodynamic states of a compressible flow using isentropic relations. These relations assume the working fluid is a calorically perfect gas (CPG) with constant specific heats, \(c_p\) and \(c_v\). Assumptions also used in the derivation of these relationships: steady flow, inviscid, no heat transfer/adiabatic, no irreversible work modes, and 1-D flow (all properties only vary in x-direction). The flow itself does not need to be isentropic for the methods utilized to be valid – the total conditions are idealized representations of what would happen if the flow were isentropically brought to a rest. If the flow is isentropic, direct use of total conditions betweeen two points on a streamline is valid. Use of isentropic relations in non- isentropic flows can still be useful for understanding the bulk trends of a compressible flow problem.

Parameters

  • M (float or int, optional) – Mach number, fluid velocity/speed of sound, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – fluid velocity, length/time, by default None

  • a (float or int or None, optional) – fluid speed of sound, by default None

  • p (float or int or None, optional) – fluid static pressure, force/area, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – fluid static density, mass/volume, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – fluid static temperature, degrees, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – fluid total pressure, force/area, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – fluid total density, mass/volume, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – fluid total temperature, degrees, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – ratio of total pressure to static pressure, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – ratio of total density to static density, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – ratio of total temperature to static temperature, by default None

  • gamma (float) – ratio of specific heats, cp/cv, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • gas (str, optional) – working fluid, eventually to be updated with other gas library, by default ‘Air’

  • R (int or float, optional) – specific gas constant, by default 287 J/kg*K for calorically perfect air

isentropic_state()

Calculates thermodynamic state to max extent possible.

Depending on arguments given when instantiating CompressibleFlow object, different end states are viable for defining the object. Without fully defining the thermodynamic state (i.e., providing two of \(p, \rho, T\)), only the property ratios are able to be calculated, assuming a Mach number is given. This function determines which method of calculation is appropriate for the given inputs, and performs the appropriate calculations.

report_outputs()
shock()
isentropic.isentropic.get_density_ratio(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total-to-static density ratio, \(\rho_t/\rho\).

This function can solve for the fluid total-to-static density ratio in several different ways.

Given \(M\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = (1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = \rho_t/\rho\)

Given \(p_t/p\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = (\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = (\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(T_t/T\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = (\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(\rho_t/\rho = (\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(\rho_t/\rho = 1\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

rho_t_ratio – total-to-static temperature ratio, \(\rho_t/\rho\)

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_fluid_velocity(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, a=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None)

Calculates fluid velocity, \(u\), based on Mach number and thermodynamic properties.

This function can solve for the fluid velocity in several different ways.

Given \(M\) and \(a\):

  • \(u = M*a\)

Given \(M\) and \(T\):

  • \(u = M * \sqrt{\gamma*R*T}\)

Given \(M\), \(P\), and \(\rho\):

  • \(u = M * \sqrt{\gamma*p/\rho}\)

If \(M = 0\), the flow is stagnant and \(u = 0\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • a (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.a, by default None

  • p (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

Returns

u – Fluid velocity, \(u\), [\(length/time\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_mach_number(gamma=1.4, R=287, a=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid Mach number, \(M\).

This function can solve for the fluid Mach number in several different ways.

Given \(u\) and \(a\):

  • \(M = u/a\)

Given \(M\) and \(T\):

  • \(M = u / \sqrt{\gamma*R*T}\)

Given \(M\), \(p\), and \(\rho\):

  • \(M = u / \sqrt{\gamma*p/\rho}\)

Given \(p_t/p\):

  • \(M = \sqrt{((\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}} - 1) * \frac{2}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(M = \sqrt{((\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma-1} - 1) * \frac{2}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(T_t/T\):

  • \(M = \sqrt{((\frac{T_t}{T}) - 1) * \frac{2}{\gamma-1}}\)

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • a (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.a, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

M – Mach number, \(u/a\)

Return type

float or int

isentropic.isentropic.get_pressure_ratio(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total-to-static pressure ratio, \(p_t/p\).

This function can solve for the fluid total-to-static pressure ratio in several different ways.

Given \(M\):

  • \(p_t/p = (1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(p_t/p = p_t/p\)

Given \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(p_t/p = (\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(p_t/p = (\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma}\)

Given \(T_t/T\):

  • \(p_t/p = (\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(p_t/p = (\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(p_t/p = 1\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

p_t_ratio – total-to-static pressure ratio, \(p_t/p\)

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_sonic_velocity(gamma=1.4, R=287, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None)

Calculates the speed of sound, \(a\), for a given fluid. Defaults to air with gamma = 1.4, R = 287 J/kg*K.

This function can solve for the speed of sound in several ways.

Given \(T\):

  • \(a = \sqrt{\gamma*R*T}\).

Given \(P\) and \(\rho\)

  • \(a = \sqrt{\gamma*p/\rho}\).

If the fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and the speed of sound in the fluid is calculated using the above relations with total conditions:

  • \(a = \sqrt{\gamma*R*T_t}\)

  • \(a = \sqrt{\gamma*p_t/\rho_t}\)

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

Raises

ValueError – Insufficient inputs provided to calculate sonic velocity.

Returns

a – Speed of sound, \(a\), [\(length/time\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_static_density(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid static density, \(\rho\)

This function can solve for the fluid static density in several different ways.

Given \(T\) and \(p\):

  • \(\rho = p/(R*T)\)

Given \(M\) and \(\rho_t\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{(1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}}\)

Given \(\rho_t/\rho\) and \(\rho_t\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(p_t/p\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{{(\frac{p_t}{p}})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{{(\frac{p_t}{p}})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(T_t/T\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(\rho = \frac{\rho_t}{{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(\rho = \rho_t\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

rho – fluid static density, \(\rho\), [\(mass/volume\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_static_pressure(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid static pressure, \(p\).

This function can solve for the fluid static pressure in several different ways.

Given \(\rho\) and \(T\):

  • \(p = \rho*R*T\)

Given \(M\) and \(p_t\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{(1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}}\)

Given \(p_t/p\) and \(p_t\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{\frac{p_t}{p}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(T_t/T\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(p = \frac{p_t}{{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(p = p_t\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

p – fluid static pressure, \(p\), [\(Force/Area\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_static_temperature(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid static temperature, \(T\).

This function can solve for the fluid static temperature in several different ways.

Given \(\rho\) and \(p\):

  • \(T = p/(\rho*R)\)

Given \(M\) and \(T_t\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{(1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)}\)

Given \(T_t/T\) and \(T_t\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{\frac{T_t}{T}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(p_t/p\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{{(\frac{p_t}{p}})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{{(\frac{p_t}{p}})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(T = \frac{T_t}{{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma-1}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(T = T_t\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

T – fluid static temperature, \(T\), [\(degrees\)].

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_temperature_ratio(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total-to-static temperature ratio, \(T_t/T\).

This function can solve for the fluid total-to-static temperature ratio in several different ways.

Given \(M\):

  • \(T_t/T = (1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)\)

Given \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(T_t/T = T_t/T\)

Given \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(T_t/T = (\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma-1}\)

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(T_t/T = (\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma-1}\)

Given \(p_t/p\):

  • \(T_t/T = (\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(T_t/T =(\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(T_t/T = 1\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

T_t_ratio – total-to-static temperature ratio, \(T_t/T\)

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_total_density(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total density.

This function can solve for the fluid total density in several different ways.

Given \(T_t\) and \(p_t\):

  • \(\rho_t = p_t/(R*T_t)\)

Given \(M\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho * (1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(\rho_t/\rho\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho * \frac{\rho_t}{\rho}\)

Given \(\rho\) and \(p_t/p\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho*(\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(\rho\) and \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho*(\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(\rho\) and \(T_t/T\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho*(\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(\rho\) and \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(\rho_t = \rho*(\frac{T_t}{T})^{\frac{1}{\gamma-1}}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(\rho = \rho_t\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

rho_t – fluid total density, \(\rho_t\), [\(mass/volume\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_total_pressure(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, rho_t=None, T_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total pressure, \(p_t\).

This function can solve for the fluid total pressure in several different ways.

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(T_t\):

  • \(p_t = \rho*R_t*T_t\)

Given \(M\) and \(p\):

  • \(p_t = p*(1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(p_t/p\) and \(p\):

  • \(p_t = p*\frac{p_t}{p}\)

Given \(p\) and \(T_t/T\):

  • \(p_t = p*{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(p\) and \(T_t\) and \(T\):

  • \(p_t = p*{(\frac{T_t}{T}})^{\frac{\gamma}{\gamma-1}}\)

Given \(p\) and \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(p_t = p*{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma}\)

Given \(p\) and \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(p_t = p*{(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho}})^{\gamma}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(p_t = p\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • T_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

p_t – fluid total pressure, \(p_t\), [\(Force/Area\)]

Return type

float

isentropic.isentropic.get_total_temperature(gamma=1.4, R=287, M=None, u=None, p=None, rho=None, T=None, p_t=None, rho_t=None, p_t_ratio=None, rho_t_ratio=None, T_t_ratio=None)

Calculates fluid total temperature, \(T_t\)

This function can solve for the fluid total temperature in several different ways.

Given \(\rho_t\) and \(p_t\):

  • \(T_t = p_t/(\rho_t*R)\)

Given \(M\) and \(T\):

  • \(T_t = T*(1 + \frac{\gamma-1}{2} * M^2)\)

Given \(T_t/T\) and \(T\):

  • \(T_t = T*\frac{T_t}{T}\)

Given \(T\) and \(p_t/p\):

  • \(T_t = T*(\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(T\) and \(p_t\) and \(p\):

  • \(T_t = T*(\frac{p_t}{p})^{\frac{\gamma-1}{\gamma}}\)

Given \(T\) and \(\rho_t/\rho\):

  • \(T_t = T*(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma-1}\)

Given \(T\) and \(\rho_t\) and \(\rho\):

  • \(T_t = T*(\frac{\rho_t}{\rho})^{\gamma-1}\)

If fluid velocity or Mach number are 0 the flow is stagnant and \(T_t = T\).

Parameters

  • gamma (float, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.gamma, by default 1.4 for calorically perfect air

  • R (int or float) – See CompressibleFlow.r, by default 287 J/kg*K

  • M (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.M, by default None

  • u (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.u, by default None

  • p (_type_, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p, by default None

  • rho (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho, by default None

  • T (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T, by default None

  • p_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t, by default None

  • rho_t (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t, by default None

  • p_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.p_t_ratio, by default None

  • rho_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.rho_t_ratio, by default None

  • T_t_ratio (float or int or None, optional) – See CompressibleFlow.T_t_ratio, by default None

Returns

T_t – fluid total temperature, \(T_t\), [\(degrees\)].

Return type

float
